episode_event_valentine_2023_ch0106_40_k:
Around the time Palentine’s Day was coming to
an end...

[Name:PlayerNickname ] approached Elesa,
looking nervous.

Oh hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. What’s the
matter? It’s already so late.
Oh, I know.

You’re also sad that Palentine’s Day is ending
soon, right?
I knew it! I feel the same way.
The apple pie Mallow made was really nice.

The campaign went really well, and Skyla looked
so happy...

This year’s Palentine’s Day will be a memory I’ll
never forget.
You were also working hard, Elesa.
Not at all. I didn’t do anything special.
Did you make any sweets?

Me? Actually... I was busy with a lot of things, so
I didn’t get the chance to make sweets.

[Name:PlayerNickname ]? Are you hiding
something from me?
I want to give this to you!
What? To me?
Please have this!
What? For me?

Is this...chocolate? Did you make it,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
Wow! That’s amazing!

You must’ve put a lot of effort into this. But I
won’t be able to eat all of it by myself...

Would you like to share these,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?

It’ll be a head-spinning memory we make at the
end of Palentine’s Day!
